verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:8
verses.text: And he took Agag the king of the Amalekites alive, and utterly destroyed all the people with the edge of the sword.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:9
verses.text: But Saul and the people spared Agag, and the best of the sheep, and of the oxen, and of the fatlings, and the lambs, and all that was good, and would not utterly destroy them: but every thing that was vile and refuse, that they destroyed utterly.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:10
verses.text: Then came the word of the Lord unto Samuel, saying,
